name: Gamemaster Howard's Know-It-All
blurb: "Know-It-All App Lets You Learn Without Thinking" - Chris Kohler - Wired

rewards.reward: THE SINGLE-PLAYER PAK - ONE COPY of the digitally distributed advance release of the iOS game AND access to the PROJECT FORUM.
THE TWO-PLAYER PAK - TWO COPIES of the digitally distributed advance release of the iOS game AND access to the PROJECT FORUM.
EARLY ADOPTERS save $5! - Everything at the $25 level but save $5 because you got here first!
THE GAMEMASTER SINGLE PLAYER PAK - ONE COPY of the digitally distributed advance release of the GAMEMASTER VERSION of the iOS game AND access to the PROJECT FORUM.
THE GAMEMASTER SUPPORTER PAK - YOUR NAME IN THE GAME in the Supporter Credits PLUS VOTING RIGHTS for the pack-in content, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $25 level.
EARLY ADOPTERS save $5! - Everything at the $50 level but save $5 because you got here first!
THE GAMEMASTER TWO-PLAYER PAK - A SECOND COPY of the digitally distributed advance release of the GAMEMASTER VERSION of the iOS game, in addition to all the REWARDS at the $30 level.

THE BETA PLAYER PAK - EARLY ACCESS to the Beta content sets as they becomes available PLUS VOTING RIGHTS for the Beta content sets PLUS your name in the BETA PLAYER CREDITS, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $50 level
EARLY ADOPTERS save $10! - Everything at the $100 level but save $10 because you got here first!

THE FRIENDS & FAMILY PAK - 3 ADDITIONAL COPIES (for a total of 5!) of the digitally distributed advance release copy of the GAMEMASTER VERSION of the iOS game PLUS 1 HIGH QUALITY PRINT from the HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL 6-part comic series - The Game of My Life, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $75 level. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.

THE SPONSOR PAK - 7 ADDITIONAL COPIES (for a total of 10!!) of the digitally distributed advance release copy of the GAMEMASTER VERSION of the iOS game PLUS your name in the SPONSOR CREDITS, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $125 level. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.

THE SEMI-PRO COLLECTOR PAK - THE COMPLETE SET! 4 ADDITIONAL HIGH QUALITY PRINTS (for a total of all 6 unique prints!) from the HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL 6-part comic series - The Game of My Life, in addition to all the REWARDS at the $150 level. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.

DESIGN TEAM MEMBER - JOIN THE DESIGN TEAM and participate in key design decisions PLUS 1 SIGNED & NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION (collectors take note: only 123 of each!) PRINT from the HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL 6-part comic series - The Game of My Life, in addition to all the REWARDS at the $200 level. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.

SUPER SPONSOR - We'll put YOUR FACE AND NICKNAME in a humorous "Super Sponsor" content set available to all players PLUS Your name in the SUPER SPONSOR CREDITS PLUS 1 ADDITIONAL (for a total of 2) SIGNED & NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION PRINT from the HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL 6-part comic series - The Game of My Life, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $250 level. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.

THE SEMI-PRO COLLECTOR PAK - 1 SIGNED & NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION (collectors note: only 75 made!) HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL GREY CARTRIDGE  PLUS 1 ADDITIONAL (for a total of 3) SIGNED AND NUMBERED LIMITED EDITION PRINT from the HOWARD & KNOW-IT-ALL 6-part comic series - The Game of My Life, all in addition to the REWARDS at the $500 level PLUS 1 LAUNCH PARTY TICKET. * International Kickstarters please add $20 for shipping.
